org.atmosphere.inject

Class BroadcasterIntrospector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.inject.InjectIntrospectorAdapter<Broadcaster>
      • org.atmosphere.inject.BroadcasterIntrospector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Injectable, InjectIntrospector

    @RequestScoped
public class BroadcasterIntrospector
extends InjectIntrospectorAdapter<Broadcaster>
    Broadcaster and Named injection support.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand
